Name: The Prologue to a Dream of Home
About the game: One hundred years before the events of A Dream of Home, Dr. Seth Schumann's reality simulation is nearly complete. With the birth of the Narcissus Project, Eridean scientists have discovered a means to project the soul as art. Who will finish Schumann's unfinished masterpiece?
